title: Create iOS Entitlements File
description: Configure entitlements for an app using Push Notifications and Sign in with Apple.
instructions: Create a Runner.entitlements file that enables: 1) Push notifications in production environment, 2) Sign in with Apple capability, 3) Associated domains for universal links to 'myapp.example.com'. Use the correct entitlement keys and value formats.

hints.text: Push notifications use 'aps-environment' key with 'production' or 'development' value
Sign in with Apple uses an array containing 'Default' string
Associated domains entries start with 'applinks:' prefix followed by the domain

commonMistakes.mistake: Using 'development' instead of 'production' for aps-environment in release builds
commonMistakes.consequence: Push notifications won't work in production App Store builds
commonMistakes.correction: Use 'production' for release/App Store builds, 'development' only for debug builds

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting the 'applinks:' prefix for associated domains
commonMistakes.consequence: Universal links won't work because iOS won't recognize the domain association
